content: Hey all, would anyone be interested in using some code snippits for common things we do with the fhir-net-api? Such as setting the auth token, or populating an Identifier, or a HumanName, requests thoughts?
(Was suggested over on the HAPI channel)
@Brian Postlethwaite I think that would be a great idea - i'd be v. happy to help out with this
I had plans to do something along the lines of https://csharp.2000things.com/ - but have not found the time yet
I think that would be great! I often have to send over snippets for devs using our api's
